turns.query: SELECT SUM(outputevents.value) FROM outputevents WHERE outputevents.stay_id IN ( SELECT icustays.stay_id FROM icustays WHERE icustays.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10004235 ) ) AND outputevents.itemid IN ( SELECT d_items.itemid FROM d_items WHERE d_items.label = 'foley' AND d_items.linksto = 'outputevents' ) AND datetime(outputevents.charttime,'start of year') = datetime('2100-03-21 13:38:00','start of year','-0 year')

turns.question: By how much has total foley output changed?
turns.query: SELECT SUM(outputevents.value) FROM outputevents WHERE outputevents.stay_id IN ( SELECT icustays.stay_id FROM icustays WHERE icustays.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10004235 ) ) AND outputevents.itemid IN ( SELECT d_items.itemid FROM d_items WHERE d_items.label = 'foley' AND d_items.linksto = 'outputevents' ) AND datetime(outputevents.charttime,'start of year') = datetime('2100-03-21 14:04:00','start of year','-0 year')

q_tag: What was the total volume of {output_name} output that patient {patient_id} had [time_filter_global1]?

turns.question: What is the total recorded output across all ICU stays during patient 10007818's ongoing hospital admission?
turns.query: SELECT SUM(outputevents.value) FROM outputevents WHERE outputevents.stay_id IN ( SELECT icustays.stay_id FROM icustays WHERE icustays.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10007818 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) )

turns.question: By how much has the cumulative recorded output changed?
turns.query: SELECT SUM(outputevents.value) FROM outputevents WHERE outputevents.stay_id IN ( SELECT icustays.stay_id FROM icustays WHERE icustays.hadm_id IN ( SELECT admissions.hadm_id FROM admissions WHERE admissions.subject_id = 10007818 and admissions.dischtime is null ORDER BY admissions.admittime DESC LIMIT 1 ) )
